overview:
## Return Value

If the system determines the status of the app, this method returns `true` if the app is the default app in the category, and `false` otherwise. If the system doesn’t determine the status, or the app exceeds the threshold rate for calling this method, it throws an error.

## Discussion

To reduce the likelihood that users face continuous requests to set a browser as their default, this API only tells the browser app if it’s the default up to four times in a year. If you call the method too frequently, it throws an error with the domain [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UIApplicationCategoryDefaultErrorDomain] and the code [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UIApplication/CategoryDefaultError/rateLimited]. # isDefault(_:)

**Instance Method**

Reports whether this app is the person’s default app in the given category.

## Declaration

```swift
nonisolated func isDefault(_ category: UIApplication.Category) throws -> Bool
```

## Parameters

- **category**: The type of app for which you test whether your app is the default.

## Return Value

If the system determines the status of the app, this method returns `true` if the app is the default app in the category, and `false` otherwise. If the system doesn’t determine the status, or the app exceeds the threshold rate for calling this method, it throws an error.

## Discussion

To reduce the likelihood that users face continuous requests to set a browser as their default, this API only tells the browser app if it’s the default up to four times in a year. If you call the method too frequently, it throws an error with the domain [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UIApplicationCategoryDefaultErrorDomain] and the code [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UIApplication/CategoryDefaultError/rateLimited]. The error’s user information dictionary contains these keys:



## Discovering if your app is the default app in a category

- **UIApplication.Category**: Constants that describe the types of apps in the system.
- **UIApplication.CategoryDefaultError**: Errors that can happen when the system checks if your app is the default app in a category.
